title: Stranger Things
description: A group of young friends in a small town uncover supernatural mysteries after the disappearance of a boy.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys through a world of perilous dangers and dark magic.

title: Money Heist
description: A group of robbers led by 'The Professor' take hostages in the Royal Mint of Spain, planning the biggest heist in history.

title: The Irishman
description: A mob hitman recalls his involvement with the infamous disappearance of labor leader Jimmy Hoffa.

title: The Crown
description: A dramatized history of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the political events that shaped the latter half of the 20th century.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine kingpin battles the criminal underworld while keeping his double life hidden from his family.

title: BoJack Horseman
description: A washed-up actor, who happens to be a horse, struggles with addiction, self-doubt, and relationships in a satirical take on Hollywood.

title: Narcos
description: The rise and fall of Pablo Escobar and the Medellín Cartel, and the efforts of law enforcement to bring them down.

title: Bird Box
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety while blindfolded to avoid a deadly unseen force.

title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology SERIES exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

title: Sex Education
description: A socially awkward teenager starts an underground sex therapy clinic at his high school, thanks to his mother, a professional therapist.

title: Bridgerton
description: In Regency-era London, eight close-knit siblings of the powerful Bridgerton family attempt to find love.

title: The Queen's Gambit
description: Orphaned chess prodigy Beth Harmon struggles with addiction as she rises to fame in the male-dominated world of competitive chess.

title: Enola Holmes
description: When her mother disappears, the youngest sibling of Sherlock Holmes embarks on a journey to find her and solve a conspiracy.

title: Umbrella Academy
description: A dysfunctional family of adopted superhero siblings reunite to solve the mystery of their father's death and prevent the apocalypse.

title: The Haunting of Hill House
description: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them away.

title: 13 Reasons Why
description: A high school student uncovers the reasons behind his friend's decision to take her own life through a SERIES of cassette tapes she left behind.

title: Extraction
description: A black-market mercenary embarks on the most dangerous extraction of his career when he's sent to rescue the kidnapped son of an international crime lord.

title: Ozark
description: A financial planner relocates his family to the Ozarks to launder money for a Mexican cartel, only to become entangled in the criminal underworld.

title: The Kissing Booth
description: A high school girl finds herself in a complicated situation when she falls for her best friend's older brother.

title: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.

title: Cobra Kai
description: Decades after the original 'Karate Kid' MOVIEs, Johnny Lawrence and Daniel LaRusso reignite their rivalry in this martial arts dramedy.

title: Lucifer
description: Lucifer Morningstar, the Devil, abandons Hell and retires to Los Angeles, where he teams up with LAPD detective Chloe Decker to solve crimes.

title: Army of the Dead
description: After a zombie outbreak in Las Vegas, a group of mercenaries ventures into the quarantine zone to pull off the greatest heist ever attempted.

title: Elite
description: When three working-class teens enroll in an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.

title: The Old Guard
description: A group of immortal warriors who have secretly protected humanity for centuries must now fight to keep their identities hidden.

title: Ratched
description: A suspenseful drama about the origin of Nurse Ratched, the notorious villain from 'One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest'.

title: The Social Dilemma
description: Exploring the dangerous human impact of social networking, with tech experts sounding the alarm on their own creations.

title: Russian Doll
description: Nadia keeps dying and reliving her 36th birthday party in a surreal time loop in this existential comedy-drama.

title: Locke & Key
description: Three siblings move into their ancestral home and discover magical keys that unlock powers and mysteries.

title: Murder Mystery
description: A New York cop and his wife go on a European vacation to reinvigorate their marriage, but end up being framed for the murder of an elderly billionaire.

title: The Serpent
description: The true story of how conman and murderer Charles Sobhraj was caught and brought to justice in the 1970s.

title: Atypical
description: A coming-of-age story of an autistic teenager who is looking for love and independence.

title: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
description: A teenage girl's secret love letters are exposed and her love life is thrown into chaos.

title: The Umbrella Academy
description: A dysfunctional family of adopted superhero siblings reunite to solve the mystery of their father’s death and prevent the apocalypse.

title: Project Power
description: In near-future New Orleans, a mysterious pill grants users temporary superpowers, leading a teenage dealer and a cop to team up with an ex-soldier to stop its creators.

title: You
description: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he's transfixed by.

title: Sweet Tooth
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a hybrid deer-boy and a wandering loner embark on an extraordinary adventure.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
description: The story of seven people on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

title: The Midnight Sky
description: A lone scientist in the Arctic races to contact a crew of astronauts returning to a post-apocalyptic Earth.

title: The Politician
description: A wealthy student has known since age seven that he’s going to be president of the United States. But first he has to navigate the most treacherous political landscape of all: high school.

title: The Dig
description: On the eve of World War II, a British widow and an amateur archaeologist embark on the excavation of Sutton Hoo in Suffolk, England.

title: The Sinner
description: Detective Harry Ambrose investigates a seemingly ordinary person who commits a shocking crime, uncovering hidden motives.

title: Outer Banks
description: A group of teenagers from the wrong side of the tracks stumble upon a treasure map that unearths a long-buried secret.

title: The Half of It
description: A shy, straight-A student helps a school jock woo the girl they both secretly love in this modern-day retelling of 'Cyrano de Bergerac.'

title: Enola Holmes 2
description: The adventures of Sherlock Holmes’ sister continue as Enola embarks on a new mystery.
